column2:
"<%me>! Welcome back!
Wow, it's like you're an old hand at this."

"But don't let your guard down. One stupid
mistake and you'll be back to being called
Newbie again."

"That probably won't happen, though, at least
based on what I've seen. But we'll just have to see."

"Now then, I look forward to
working with you in the future, <%me>!!"

"<%me>！
お帰り！
もう漂う雰囲気はベテランね。"

"でも油断しちゃダメよ。
何かポカミスがあろうものなら
すぐに「へっぽこぴー」に戻すからね！"

"……まあ、今回の様子を見るに
それはもうなさそうな感じだけど。"

"それじゃ、これからもよろしくね！
<%me>！"
